name: The Callisto Protocol
summary: Krafton subsidiary Striking Distance Studios, which is led by Dead Space creator Glen Schofield, announced story-driven single-player survival horror game The Callisto Protocol for consoles and PC at The Game Awards 2020. It will launch in 2022.
info:
• 发行: Krafton
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Consoles
  • 游戏类型: Survival horror
  • 发行日期: 2022年
  • 官方网站: https://callistothegame.com/en
  • 开发: Striking Distance Studios
